name: Floyd Lewis
descriptions: Floyd Lewis is a Vault 101 engineer in 2277. He is seen dead in a control room when the Lone Wanderer is trying to escape near several radroaches.

Floyd Lewis was a talented engineer and technician, but was unskilled in the use of firearms. He was kind to the Lone Wanderer growing up, but was killed during their escape by a group of radroaches that he didn't see coming.
